name: Space Shooter (itch) (LiamCodesHard)
description:
Game Created By Liam Ashton For CourseraGamesDevCourse

Modifications:
1. An easy and explorative starter Level

2. A boss enemy that can both chase AND shoot

3. Collectables that give health bonus and set respawn point

4. Collectables that power up the players gun -
a. it starts off as a single-shot gun and upgrades to automatic 
b.  the rate of fire is increased each time  one is collected

5. Destroyable asteroids that block the way and spawn at the player.

6. Display Lives in the UI.

7. Has a working instruction menu
